name: Isaias Valdez
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
My name is Isaias Valdez, and I’m very interested in applying for a Budtender position. I have over 5 years of Customer Service experience and over 5 years of Cannabis growing/processing experience. I have my marijuana worker permit card, and I'm an OMMP patient cardholder as well. I’m very passionate about the Cannabis culture, and am eager to learn all about the industry.  I’ve been a consumer for 13+ years, so I’ve done just about everything from making oil to raising giant plants from cuttings.  I know the difference between stain types and can tell you about their effects. My attention to detail, self-starter attitude and proven problem-solving skills make me a valuable asset to any organization. I’m also friendly, loyal, and always willing to help where needed. I have a neat, well-dressed appearance as well.


I pride myself in my work performance and my company’s reputation in the community. In my past work as a Cashier, I was entrusted with working quickly, efficiently and safely, documenting and delivering accurate data, and being unfailingly polite toward our customers. As a Technical Support Specialist, I continue to adhere to these duties when given a task by my manager to complete, giving helpful advice to a customer, or when dealing with difficult respondents over the phone. I can use my bilingual skills to communicate effectively with Spanish-speaking customers as well.


I've attached a copy of my resume for you to review. Thank you for taking the time to read this. I hope you will consider me for this position. You can reach me at (541) 954-6113 or my e-mail isaiasvaldez@live.com.
